name: Cold War Mann!
description:
The controls for the game are arrow keys to movement, 'X' to continue through messages, and 'R' to restart the game.

Created by Jarod Haney and Luke Cunningham, this project is a Puzzlescript rendition of the classic spy mission of break in, get information, and get out alive. The goal was to push the limits of the puzzlescript program by creating a rudimentary enemy AI capable of chasing the player while also providing a bit of theatrical flare. The player is prompted to enter a facility to obtain information about a previously failed mission. Players will put themselves into the shoes of Agent Mann and traverse the floors of the facility to find the answer to a mysterious question.
